imdb.title: Shinigami Bocchan to Kuro Maid
imdb.plot: A cursed duke who kills everyone he touches lives in a mansion in the forest, with only a butler and a seductive maid for company. Will he free himself of his curse?

episodes.title: The Duke and Alice
episodes.plot: As a child, Duke was cursed by a witch to "take the life of anything he touches". As a result, he was forced to live in solitude, away from his family. His maid, Alice, harasses him every single day.

episodes.title: The Duke, His Butler, and a Lost Cat
episodes.plot: Duke's butler, Rob, who was taking a break from an injured back, returns to the mansion. Witnessing Rob take on his duties briskly, the duke is relieved - until he finds out that there's another problem..

episodes.title: The Duke and the Full Moon and the Meteor Shower
episodes.plot: Duke loses a billiard match against Alice and the two end up heading to town together. Despite having dressed up in a thick costume to avoid touching anyone, the duke is overwhelmed by the atmosphere and crowd in town.

episodes.title: The Duke and Alice and Memories of Snow
episodes.plot: Duke feels slightly awkward after refusing to kiss Alice and he senses some sort of distance between them - Few days later, it begins to snow as everyone decide to play outside the manor.

episodes.title: The Duke, a Crow, and Ice Skating
episodes.plot: Viola visits and declares Alice must learn how to make a cute face. Viola insists on helping Alice cook but keeps getting distracted by Rob.

episodes.title: The Duke, Alice, and a Night in the Witches' World
episodes.plot: A cat steals Alice's gown while she showers, forcing her to wear Duke's coat and allowing ample opportunities to tease him. Cuff and Zain take Duke and Alice to the Sabbath disguised as witches.

episodes.title: The Duke's and Alice's Uneventful Day
episodes.plot: Alice buys a witches pot to brew a potion that supposedly removes curses. Alice has Duke perform a song which if played perfectly can cure curses.

episodes.title: White Snow, Black Clothes
episodes.plot: Cuff asks Duke to teach her to read and write to impress Zain. During a snowstorm Alice reminisces about her first time at the mansion when Duke was younger.

episodes.title: The Duke, Alice, and the Christmas Eve Vow
episodes.plot: Viola decides to gift Rob a handkerchief at Duke's Christmas party. Walter illicitly follows Viola to Duke's mansion disguised as her driver.

episodes.title: The Duke, Alice, and a Song for Two
episodes.plot: Alice dreams about her mother, Sharon, maid to Duke's mother when Duke was young. Alice is troubled Duke may be forced to choose between her or his family one day.

episodes.title: The Duke and Secret Magic
episodes.plot: Viola searches the family mansion for clues and finds a servant's logbook. Zain steals the logbook, intending to burn it after Daleth threatened Cuff.

episodes.title: Together with the Duke...
episodes.plot: Duke sees his mother but she says it's late so they will speak tomorrow. At dinner The Duke's mother explains that with their father terminally ill they must decide on the family heir and gives Duke until spring to break his curse.
